of or relating to marriage : connubial

definition: someone who is married has been formally joined in marriage with another person
Adverbs
married
: happily, unhappily
: newly, recently
: lawfully, legally
involving marriage or people who are married
in: a married woman/man
married to: He’s married to my older sister.
get married: We’re getting married next year.
I am a happily married man with three children.
Everyone present at the wedding ceremony walks up to the front to congratulate the newly married couple.
This pension will only be paid to legally married partners.
married life
be married to something

definition: having a wife or husband:
to begin a legal relationship with someone as their husband or wife:
in: a married couple
